name: Lycoris Radiata
description:
Synopsis

Due to your parents' jobs, you transfer to a new school and meet three girls who each have their own problems. Will you be the light in their lives? Or will you make the "right" choice? What choice will you make?

This game is not finished yet, only one character's story linecan be experienced. If there are a lot of comments, I'll go ahead and finish the remaining two stories and even add a more complicated "multi-line ending".

Trigger Warning:

This game includes imagery and story of self harm which could be disturbing for some participants.
